name: Hamsters In The Outer Space
description:
Hamsters in the Outer Space is a 3D platformer where you play as a cute little hamster in its spatial ball searching for food in exotic planets. 

- Find all of the food on the current planet and travel to the next one!

- Explore 4 different planets and scenarios with unique physical characteristics!

CONTROLS:
- Use WASD to move
- Use SPACEBAR to jump
- Use MOUSE to look around

Hamsters in the Outer Space is a little prototype I made during my studies in school.
I found funny thinking about little hamsters running in their plastic balls as little astronauts searching for food in other mysterious planets.
I love 3D platformers and I though it was playful to recreate a Super Mario Galaxy kind of physics, changing the gravity and conformation of the level based on the planet.
I don't know yet if this prototype will become something more intruiguing, but in the meantime have fun playing this little demo!
